project.name: |-- 001-algorithms
project.description:
Keywords: + Bubblesort, Bubble sort + Binary Search
This project includes very simple examples involving Annotations.
BubbleSortDemo: Demonstrates how to implement the bubblesort algorithm for sorting a List of a generic type T that implements Comparable.
BinarySearchDemo: An imperative implementation of the Binary Search for a sorted List of a generic type T.
